films.name: Summer Blockbuster
films.description: Produce and manage the company's flagship summer blockbuster film, including casting, filming, and post-production.

films.name: Digital Campaign for Movie Release
films.description: Develop and execute a marketing campaign for the release of a new movie, including digital advertising, social media promotion, and PR activities.

films.name: Film Festival Distribution
films.description: Plan and coordinate the distribution of a movie to various film festivals, including submission logistics and screening arrangements.

films.name: Premiere Gala
films.description: Organize the premiere gala for the company's latest movie release, including venue selection, red carpet arrangements, and guest invitations.
